caption.p:
( A) Greenland: North Greenland Ice Core Project (NGRIP) temperature ( 8). ( B) South Carpathians: δ 13C of stalagmite POM1 from AC. ( C) Southern Black Sea: coastal IRD abundance in core M72-5 ( 11). ( D) East Carpathians: δ 18O of stalagmite 1152, TC. ( E) Northern Black Sea: TEX 86 summer sea surface temperatures ( 33). The gray bars indicate Heinrich stadials. A map with locations of records is available in
SI Appendix, Fig. S1 .
